definition: to prescribe medicine/to poison/to slip a drug (into sb's drink etc)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]
lit. to prescribe the right medicine for an illness (idiom); fig. to study a problem to find the right way to solve it/to take appropriate steps

sentences.english: After drinking it, she found herself floating and flew all they way to the moon.
sentences.chinese: 喝下药之后他发现自己飘浮起来并飞向了月亮。

sentences.english: Jimmy swallowed the medicine and made a face.
sentences.chinese: 吉米吞下药后扮了个苦相。

sentences.english: Once when she drinks it, she'll never be thin again.
sentences.chinese: 一旦她服下药后，她将永远不能瘦下去了。

sentences.english: In doing ideological work, one must suit one's methods to the situation.
sentences.chinese: 做思想工作必须对症下药。

sentences.english: His financial white paper gets much right.
sentences.chinese: 他的金融白皮书有很多对症下药之处。

sentences.english: After drinking it, she found herself floating and flew all the way to the moon.
sentences.chinese: 喝下药之后他发现自己飘浮起来并飞向了月亮。

sentences.english: I must help her hold the medicine down.
sentences.chinese: 我必须先解决她吃下药就吐出的病况。

sentences.english: Some of the young were addicted to drugs drugs the emptiness of their lives.
sentences.chinese: 一些年轻者耽溺于药物下药他们的生命的空虚。

sentences.english: If she had swiftly reached trained medical staff with the right drugs, she would not have died.
sentences.chinese: 如果有训练有素的医护人员对症下药，她不会死去。

sentences.english: And it is possible to find the right medicine even from a quack doctor.
sentences.chinese: 甚至是江湖郎中对症下药也是可能的。

sentences.english: I think he was the one drugging me.
sentences.chinese: 我认为他是那一个下药我。

definition: to put poison in sth/to poison
knockout drops/incapacitating agent/Mickey Finn
to knock sb out with a drug/to render sb unconscious
to fuddle/to befuddle/to inebriate/to get someone drunk
aphrodisiac
to drug and then rape sb
to kill by poisoning
poison
laxative
to seduce/to lead into sex
to frame sb (by planting sth on them)
to conspire to murder/to plot against sb's life
to take poison
to impute/to shift the blame onto someone else
to force oneself upon sb (idiom)/to rape
antidote
